page.title: 10EMERGENCY SERVICES
page.content: We have a Fire Station with a part_time brigade, 1 fire engine and 1 fire landrover. We have a police station but this is only manned at intervals. 3 men patrol the district by car during each 24 hours. They work 3x8 hour shifts. A 4th man rests. If you dialled 999 your call would go to Chester. They could send a car within 3 minutes of receiving the call. The building of the M6 has not affected police calls, but it has affected the fire and ambulance services. The ambulance comes from Sandbach. The police answer all emergency calls which are mainly burglaries and traffic accidents. They all receive special training but only traffic police drive at very high speed. They are liable to prosecution if they cause an accident. All casualities are taken to Leighton H.
